summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Orcas Street, from 52nd Avenue South to Lake Washington Boulevard, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8106 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
